for libevd1.lib and libevd1.exp:
 > cl /c libevd1.cpp 
 > link /DLL /DEF:libevd1.def libevd1.obj 

for evd1.exe:
 > cl evd1.cpp

for evd11.exe:
 > cl evd11.cpp

for ev2.exe:
 > cl ev2.c



for libd2.lib and libd2.exp:
 > cl /c libd2.cpp 
 > link /DLL /DEF:libd2.def libd2.obj 

for pd22.exe:
 > cl pd22.cpp

for pd2.exe:
 > cl pd2.cpp
